thread.section_title: Moving of America Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Moving of America | movingofamerica.com
thread.title: Charles Gifford
thread.title_full: Moving of America reviewed by Charles Gifford

author: Charles Gifford
title: Charles Gifford
text:
The three men (Joe, Roberto, Armando) who helped me to move were superb. They worked tirelessly and efficiently and absolutely erased the stress that most of us experience when moving house.
I first used Moving of America when they had not long set up and used them again for this move because they had been so exceptional the first time.
Their ethos has not changed: completely efficient, fast response to queries, superb office staff (David, Lola, Adam), and a seeming determination to remove all the hassles and concerns of moving house.
Thank you very much. I would use you again and recommend you to anyone who needs moving services.
